topic.title: DOOM 2016 Music Gamerip (FLAC & MP3)
topic.body:
Zenimax is on a takedown spree and this type of music must be heard, grab this while it's hot, and it's ripped and mixed from the game's raw files so it's worth it.

MEGA - FLAC, MP3 CBR192, MP3 CBR320
https://mega.nz/#F!XMsTDR6A!zxO1xg_znF6LnkBKk2ugpw

Yandex.Disk FLAC
https://yadi.sk/d/eqdVUdPSrzVwm

Yandex.Disk MP3 320
https://yadi.sk/d/DO63FGOHrzSiK
